com.guidewire.pl.plugin.security

Interface AuthenticationSourceCreatorPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPlugin
    Deprecated. 
    External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface AuthenticationSourceCreatorPlugin
extends IPlugin
    This plugin is responsible for creating an AuthenticationSource from an HTTPRequest object. The authentication source must be usable by the AuthenticationServicePlugin defined in the plugin config.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      gw.plugin.security.AuthenticationSource createSourceFromHTTPRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Deprecated. 
      Creates an authentication source from a servlet request.

    • Method Detail

      • createSourceFromHTTPRequest

        gw.plugin.security.AuthenticationSource createSourceFromHTTPRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                    throws gw.plugin.security.InvalidAuthenticationSourceData
        Deprecated. 
        Creates an authentication source from a servlet request.
        Parameters:
        request - The source request.
        Returns:
        An authentication source representing the data in the request.
        Throws:
        gw.plugin.security.InvalidAuthenticationSourceData
